channel.title: [PI] Forced to Walk [PI]
channel.description:
I am making a Monkey Madness type cave, but, I don't want them to have the ability to run.
I already disabled it so if you're in the cave, you cannot toggle the run button.
How do I make it so if they click the cave (4499) after they are teleported inside, they are forced to walk?
[code]!c.isRunning2[/code]?

item.title: [PI] Forced to Walk [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

I have the void inBossCave() already, I need the method that switches the player to walking instead of running…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Forced to Walk [PI]
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

You can try and make an private void IsInCave or something…

And then…

case 4499:
if IsInCave
then…

(sorry if this isn’t that helpful but I can’t really just type out code)

Read full topic
